preferences.name: hideOnEmpty
preferences.title: Hide toolbar when empty
preferences.description: Hides the toolbar when no new feed entries are found. It is shown again automatically once new entries are discovered

preferences.title: Update timer interval
preferences.description: The time between automatic feed updates, in seconds
